Para la implementación del plan de manejo de su finca, él está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que le ayuden a mejorar la nutrición de sus cafetos. Sus principales retos hasta ahora han sido las enfermedades que enfrentan las plantaciones de café, pero está seguro que con la aplicación oportuna de insumos, y la puesta en práctica de las recomendaciones del equipo técnico que lo apoya, podrá salir adelante y tener una mejor cosecha este ciclo.
 
El sueño de Wilmer es contar con una finca modelo que le ayude a mejorar los ingresos para su familia y darles mejores oportunidades que las que él ha tenido.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a small coffee grower in the north of Nicaragua. For the past 19 years, he has worked growing coffee as his primary economic activity.  Currently, with three years of experience, he has managed to participate in the certification process for Fair Trade and is counting on the continued improvement to succeed in improving the productivity of his plantation. 

This young entrepreneur managed to finish his secondary schooling and is father to two minors for whom he works hard every day to give them a better economic situation.

To implement his plan for running his plantation, he is asking for a loan with which to purchase agricultural supplies that will help improve the nutrition of his coffee plants. His primary challenges up to now have been the diseases that his coffee plants face, put he is sure that with timely application of these materials, and putting into practice the recommendations of the technical team that supports him, he will be able to get ahead and have a better harvest this season.

Wilmer's dream is to have a model farm that helps him to improve the income for his family and provide them better opportunities than those which he has had.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies that will help improve the nutrition of his coffee plants.

loans.name: Milagro Isabel

texts.es:
Milagro, hace uso de un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono, semilla, herbicidas, fertilizantes e insecticidas, para iniciar a preparar el terreno en el que cultivará granos básicos, de esta manera abastecer  a su familia y a sus clientes para época de verano.
Su producción es mayor, protegió a sus cultivos de plagas, mejoro sus ingresos, ha cancelado sus deudas y optimizado las circunstancias familiares. Su hogar tiene un nuevo miembro.
texts.en:
Milagro will use a new loan to purchase manure, seeds, herbicides, fertilizers and insecticides to begin to prepare the land where she will grow basic grains, and in this way sustain her family and her customers for the winter season. 

She has more production, protected her plants from pests, improved her income, paid off her debts, and improved her family circumstances.  Her household has a new member.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds, herbicides, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: Gregorio es soltero pero tiene 6 hijos Gregorio vive con dos de sus hijos en El Alto en una casa que es de su propiedad Gregorio es chofer propietario de un minibus y trabaja desde las seis de la mañana hasta las ocho de la noche Gregorio solicita un prestamo para reparar su minibus Gregorio es el unico sustento de los dos hijos con los que vive por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Gregorio is single but has 6 children. Gregorio lives with 2 of his children in El Alto in a house that he owns. Gregorio is the driver and owner of a minibus and works from 6 in the morning until 8 at night. Gregorio is requesting a loan to repair his minibus. Gregorio is the only source of income for the 2 children with whom he lives and this is why he needs your help.

loans.use: to repair his minibus.

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq femmes du groupe Tiessiri vivent toutes dans des familles nucléaires. Elles ont en moyenne 34 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier pelengana sud  l’un des quartiers de  Ségou (4ème Région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté, mariage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le village. Elles font le petit commerce d’habillement, de produit cosmétique, condiment et de fruits et légumes. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur  3eme cycle du prêt solidaire.
 Madame Djénébou   (la 1ere femme debout de la gauche vers la droite dans la photo) est une grande vendeuse de pagne wax dans le quartier et ses environnants. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter  des pièces de pagnes wax à Bamako et à Ségou. La vente se fait au comptant et souvent à crédit à la maison, au marché  et en ambulant à  une clientèle mixte.
 Madame Djénébou   espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen  de 30 000 FCFA avec ce prêt, qui sera utilisé pour des petits besoins de ses enfants et augmenter également  son fonds de commerce. Elle souhaite continuer la collaboration  avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The five ladies of the Tiessiri Group all live within nuclear family frameworks. The average age of each member is 34 years old and on average they have three children each. They all live in South Pelegana, which is one of the districts of Ségou, the fourth administrative region of the Republic of Mali. They all know each other through the bonds of community, family and their revenue-generating activities in the village. Members of this group work selling clothing, cosmetic products, everyday food items and fruits and vegetables. In order to increase their working capital, the members of the group decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso. This will be their third loan with the institution.

Djénébou, the woman standing to the far left of the photo, is a successful vendor of pagne wax cloth in the district and its surrounding areas. She plans on using this loan to buy sheets of pagne wax cloth in Bamako and Ségou. She sells these goods in exchange for cash, and often credit, out of her own home, at market and as a travelling vendor to a customer base made up of both men and women. With this loan, Djénébou is hoping to make an average monthly profit of 30,000 FCFA, which will be used to see to her children's needs and also increase her own working capital. She hopes to continue this collaboration with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to purchase traditional pagne wax cloth

loans.name: Thomas Donaciano

texts.es:
Thomas tiene 39 años de edad, vive en una comunidad rural al norte de Nicaragua en la cual produce café. Además, cultiva otros rubros para su autoconsumo como frijol y maíz, logran así diversificar su pequeña finca, aprovechando los recursos con los que cuenta.

Para este ciclo, él está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que le permitan mejorar los rendimientos y calidad de su café, lo cual es parte del plan de mejora nutricional de su cafetal.

El sueño de este productor es incrementar la productividad de su finca, y con ello los ingresos que percibe para brindar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
Thomas is 39 years old. He lives in a rural community in the north of Nicaragua where he produces coffee. He also grows other items for his own consumption such as beans and corn. He has been able to diversify his little farm, making use of the resources that he has.
For this cycle, he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to increase the yield and quality of his coffee. This is part of his plan for improving his plantation. 
His plan is to increase the productivity of his farm and, with this, the income that he receives so that he can offer his family better conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to increase the yields and quality of his coffee.
